name: A Perilous Union
description:
SUMMARY

Cleanse the underworld of its evil magic while your movements are linked with your enemy's.  Walk over magic seals to remove them, but beware, enemies use these for teleportation.

There are 7.1 levels

Made within 48hrs for GMTK Game Jam 2021


CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Move
Enter - Accept/Confirm


ARTS

Most art assets were made during the 48hr jam period.

Music:  Soularflair - CUE2
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Soularflair/CUES_for_film_TV_games_etc_DARK/C...
